name: Numix Tabs for Thunderbird 15+
description: A tab style for Thunderbird based on the Numix GTK Theme (http://numixproject.org) and on Numix for Firefox. Changes tab toolbar and tab appearance.
additional_info:
This style adds styling to the tab bar to fit the Numix GTK Theme (http://numixproject.org). It is based on Numix for Firefox and is an adaptation for Thunderbird of my style Numix Tabs for Firefox 29+. Tested with Thunderbird 31.8.0, Stylish 2.0.2.1 and Numix GTK Theme on Linux Mint 17.2 Cinnamon 2.6 64bit. This style is not going to be actively maintained, but feel free to make any tweaks. Version 1 11 Aug 2015
  • changes tab bar appearance
  • changes tab appearance
  • surpresses default 'curvy' tabs
